name: Easy Slide Show
author: Rajesh Jhala

sections.description:
Easy Slide Show can allows you to add easy slide show to your website with the help of shortcode & widget. With Easy Slide Show you can add custom slide show or can add feature post images to Easy Slide Show. Easy Slide Show is a responsive slide show.

Thank You

Thank you trying this plugin!
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin and extract the files
  2. Upload to your wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Check the “Easy Slides” Tab created by this plugins for setup.

Enjoy!
sections.faq:
How to add slide show to website?

You should add below shortcode or can use Easy Slide Show widget

[easyslideshow numberposts=”5″]

  • numberposts: set number of slides
